text: Chesterfield F.C. are an English football club. They started in 1866 and are based in Chesterfield in the county of Derbyshire. They play at a stadium called the Recreation Ground. == League position == Season League Position 2000/01 Third Division 3rd 2001/02 Second Division 18th 2002/03 Second Division 20th 2003/04 Second Division 20th 2004/05 League One 17th 2005/06 League One 16th 2006/07 League One 21st 2007/08 League Two 8th 2008/09 League Two 10th === Former position === Category:English football clubs Category:1867 establishments in England
title: Chesterfield F.C.
